pr_title: Screenshot: Block Untradeable Drops within the Gauntlets

timeline.bodyHTML:
This needs to account for instances

Suggested change
return this.client.isInInstancedRegion() && this.client.getMapRegions().length > 0 && (this.client.getMapRegions()[0] == GAUNTLET_REGION_ID || this.client.getMapRegions()[0] == CORRUPTED_GAUNTLET_REGION_ID);
final Player localPlayer = client.getLocalPlayer();
if (localPlayer == null || !client.isInInstancedRegion())
{
return false;
}
final WorldPoint p = WorldPoint.fromLocalInstance(client, localPlayer.getLocalLocation());
return p.getRegionID() == GAUNTLET_REGION_ID || p.getRegionID() == CORRUPTED_GAUNTLET_REGION_ID;
timeline.author: dekvall

replies.author: Nightfirecat

timeline.body: imo these don't need an `ID` suffix
timeline.bodyText: imo these don't need an ID suffix
timeline.bodyHTML: imo these don't need an ID suffix
timeline.author: dekvall

replies.bodyText:
return location.getRegionID() == AGILITY_ARENA_REGION_ID;
Preference, I suppose.
replies.author: basicDamen

timeline.body: Would there be any reason to want your gauntlet untradeables screenshotted, ie should this be configurable?
timeline.bodyText: Would there be any reason to want your gauntlet untradeables screenshotted, ie should this be configurable?
timeline.bodyHTML: Would there be any reason to want your gauntlet untradeables screenshotted, ie should this be configurable?
timeline.author: dekvall

replies.bodyText: No as EVERY single item dropped by them is untradeable and generates a screenshot for EACH item/item stack. I killed ONE npc and got 3 screenshots. You kill multiple every single run, therefore you start loading up on screenshots that are absolutely useless.
replies.author: basicDamen

timeline.message: adds check for being inside normal or corrupted gauntlet
